CopyPlus.name: Copy+ button
CopyPlus.description: Adds the Copy+ button, which allows you to pick and choose which attributes to copy!

unlocked.name: Only Unlocked
unlocked.description: When enabled, only unlocked icons and colors will be copied!

copySelf.name: Enable on own profile
copySelf.description: Enable copy buttons on your own profile

updateProfile.name: Enabling this updates data to display which icons you're currently using onto the servers!
updateProfile.description: Updates the icons on your profile whenever you copy icons! You must refresh your profile for stuff to update onto the sevrers!
